website_summaries.verdict: TDK's Three Speaker Boombox is as beautiful as it is powerful, but the hefty design does not travel well.
pros: The TDK Three Speaker Boombox delivers a finely tuned, powerful sound in a portable system with an unforgettable design
Features such as AM/FM radio, as well as RCA and instrument input, set it apart from the competition
cons: There's no way to secure your iPod/iPhone or other connected device
radio antennas are handled by two dangling wires
hefty weight and battery-hungry design make portability impractical

customer_reviews.title: tdk awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice to look at a bit more power wouldn't hurt. the size is on nice and big. has a more refined sound lots of depth if u want Obnoxious sound go for sony's g700 It sells for about 100 dollars and puts out a lot of sound also The tweeters getting your ear a lot more in the base is a bit More presence Do too it's ported design. But then again the TDK is geared at a more of a Affluent audience. They will definitely appreciate the rich sound I would highly recommend this you get hours of enjoyment just looking at it.

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: everything you've read on quality, build, sound perfection, and looks is true. Nevermind the nay sayers on how "big" or "heavy" it may be. They are just not ready for the awesome power and beauty of a machine that makes big sound and looks and feels outstanding. If you're a fan of well made products, timeless style, and a unique device that delivers music how it should, then this produict is for you! I bought refurbished from TDK direct on amazon, so you won't have to pay the heavy 500$ they usually would expect. Get some quality in your music life. F all the others because they don't come close...
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Built like tank on off built like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for as long as it worked- the on off dial would not turn the unit on after one summers patio use built and weighs like a tank but a simple piece like on off switch ruined this purchase this is defiantly to Heaney and mean gheavy to send back to repair or ever bring to the beach
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Music Player
customer_reviews.text: After having listened to various music players including the Zeppelin Air, I decided on the TDK LOR 3 due to it's build quality and sound. I have been listening to the 3 for a few weeks now and am satisfied with my purchase. It is loud enough to fill a room without distorting and let's you plug an instrument to play alone or along with your music.
customer_reviews.author: Clearsky311

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest boombox ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest boombox ever. I have a samsung so not an issue not having an iphone doc, i have my smaller ihome boom box for that. For sound you cant beat this boom box it's perfect by the pool or for parties and your friends will be like - say what?
customer_reviews.author: GetMac

customer_reviews.title: So heavy but sooooo cool.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. amazing look. featured on Glee :) Needs bluetooth compatibility, finicky with different ipod cables, finicky with connection to ipod classic.
customer_reviews.author: luvmousey

customer_reviews.title: slick and solid
customer_reviews.text: i feel heavy construction is a plus. bass is B+. style is a+. feel bluetooth adds nothing so i don't miss it. equalizer is ok. ergonomics are top notch>
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bedford

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best things I've bought in recent history and well worth ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I've bought in recent history and well worth the money! It's built rock solid and sounds fantastic. The only problem is that it does not even have the basic functionality of a cheap $20 MP3 player; just use it as a speaker, that's all and you will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome finish, designed for retro, cool beyond the price! Sound is OK, limited bass response
customer_reviews.text: The whole TDK retro line is the coolest line in consumer electronics! I want it all! This fit and finish is great, interaction of remote and USB iPod charging is odd, but works. Looks like something from a 70-80s movie, would be awesome if it has better Bass.
customer_reviews.author: It all started with a Kenwood turntable

customer_reviews.title: Great retro-looking boombox
customer_reviews.text: Pretty loud for its size. I use it as a DJ monitor connected to a Traktor Kontrol S2. Sounds best when connected using the Instrument input and a 1/4" cable. It looks great and puts out nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: rokutanda

customer_reviews.title: Please Upgrade The Firmware to fix USB audio issue
customer_reviews.text: 5/1/2012 Need a USB flash drive next go to [...] download "firmware Upgrade" and the simple to follow instruction manual When it is all complete, the unit sounds Fabulous ! This boombox brings back good memories from my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice System and great visually
customer_reviews.text: Great product if distance isnt a problem for you. The sound is amazing and can fill a room with ease. Good bass as well. The only flaws I have with the box is that it should have come with a remote or an embedded hard drive. I have it hooked up to my laptop docking station and sometimes my smartphone. Like I said before its delivers good sound quality from a single unit. I get compliments all the time on it as well. Just get a nice stable table and connect all your stuff for a stunning setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ejike OKanu

customer_reviews.title: Sounds as good as it looks,.....Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: look's good sounds good yes its heavy, but good speakers are heavy $500.00 bucks, = A+ sound

customer_reviews.title: Great, with some quirks
customer_reviews.text: I love it for the look, and for sound quality it's solid by me (but I'm not audiophile). It seems odd though, that while I play music via USB, the files are always sorted in the order they were put on the USB key, not alphabetically.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Do Khoi

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing performs like this unit from a portable standpoint. Though it weighs a lot it is quality throughout. As others have mentioned a remote would have been nice, but I need the exercise anyway. Don't forget to order a stand separately.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great for parties! Haven't tried it with batteries, but i'm happy with it so far...Makes great speakers for kAREOKE with my laptop!

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful . and strong return of  TDK
customer_reviews.text: Classic design brings us back to the era of the eighties With the appearance of a beautiful and luxurious After the experience at everything looks amazing in the touch-screen panel controls, to the beautiful backlit displays , the quality the distribution of stereo system the Correct He's already , Boombox for iPod, iPhone and iPad This is a quick preliminary review of the TDK . Recommend for Music Lovers.

customer_reviews.title: old school meets new school.
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and sounds great. Has a great bass and works perfect for dancing or anything with a beat. Outstanding.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is big, sounds great, and looks stunning. Most importantly though, it plays from my Iphone 4gs without issue and charges the phone. Also, I tested a 32gb flash drive and that worked well. I'm very happy with this Purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Wow the sound!
customer_reviews.text: Initial thoughts are that this item is awesome. The power is undeniable, and the clarity for a boom box is unique. Its big, but not too bad. I wish it had a remote, but the design and sound far out weigh the negative on this item. This thing just rocks!

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Take it to parties all the time! the sound quality is incredible and it gets super loud! I hightly recommend this stereo. The only negative thing about it is that it doesnt come with a remote. :)

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I could have made. I truely love this system!!! I would recommend this system to anyone interested.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to find this product for a great price and love it! Anyone looking for a great boom box or just speaker should definitely look into this!
customer_reviews.author: Kicker43

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, looks great on my living room. Only suggestion is it could have blue tooth for ease and convenience of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amaury Pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected it to be...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit after reading all the reviews about it online. Everyone stated it was loud and had great sound. Although it is has deep and rich sound. It is not nearly as loud as I thought it would be. I have taken it out to several volleyball matches and people can stand right over it and hold a conversation. I have a Lasonic boombox and although not really as rich sounding it gets a lot louder.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Just plain COOL !!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad the "BIG Boombox" is back ... Sounds great and has many awesome features ... Gonna keep the whole "hood" rockin ...
customer_reviews.author: DeWayne Turner

customer_reviews.title: TDK Brings the Power
customer_reviews.text: Great construction quality. Heavy-duty weight and materials. Excellent sound and powerful bass. Volume setting "goes to 11," which is awesome. I purchased this for both iPod use and for typical line in use. Excels at both. Sound quality is better when working with direct USB source. Could use slighly better iPod integration, but overall, very good. Upgradable firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: TDK 3 Speaker Radio/Boombox
customer_reviews.text: It's big, heavy (over 30 pounds!) and sounds great! Most boomboxes of the last 20-25 years have been cheaply built, low quality items. The TDK boombox reminds me of all the cool boomboxes of the 70s and early 80s, but with some modern features. It charges your iPhone/iPod when plugged in to the USB port. It's very easy to use, as well. Unlike most modern electronics, you don't need a college degree to operate it. Good stuff! Buy one. Just remember it's heavy! Which is all good with me...
customer_reviews.author: 1969 Plymouth VIP

customer_reviews.title: nice retro modern boom box but the dang thing is ...
customer_reviews.text: nice retro modern boom box but the dang thing is heavy. get your weight up if you plan on taking this radio further than 10 yards. geeezz
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SICK!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item one Saturday and and got it Tuesday. It weighs like 15-20 lbs!!!!! It looks so nice, and sounds even better. I haven't had problems with it at all.. I am going to download the update for it just in case. I loved this so much I ordered the TDK TWO SPEAKERS WIRELESS BOOMBOX..
customer_reviews.author: guadalupe c banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good but not great... After several days listening, this is a good product with the build quality, aesthetics, and even the connections...solid is what I would describe. The letdown was the sound; it never opened up for me and after comparing it with other high-end and similarly priced competitors (Bowers & Wilkins Zeppelin Air Wireless AirPlay & Bose Soundock) it went back... It's a shame because I liked the build and look.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lozito

customer_reviews.title: Better Boombox
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed at the amazing sounds from the speakers/woofer. Just a bit too heavy, should have a remote control and maybe a built-in CD Player. Other wise it is the best boombox in the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Mazda Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit big and heavy, but if that is not a problem for you, you will not get a better system for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was going to give it less the five stars because it lacks a few features but it does what its advertised to do very well. Sounds awesome even when its cranked.

customer_reviews.title: TDK
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and function! Love the ease of use and the quality. Bought this for my son, and he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: TDK
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality in tailgate environment attached to Ipod. Radio reception however is very poor considering the quality of devise

customer_reviews.title: looks good too expensive and very fragile cannot find a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: looks good too expensive and very fragile cannot find a replacement power supply which went kaput

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Received product and it did not work, no sound came out of any speaker. Was to scared to try and order another one.
customer_reviews.author: jackie t

customer_reviews.title: iOS 5.0 Makes this no longer work ...
customer_reviews.text: Before iOS 5 came out, the TDK Boombox was excellent - I could plug my iPhone in and play music while it charged. With iOS 5 upgrade, I plug the iPhone in and it does the "blink noise, I am connected to power" every second and makes it worthless for playing your iPhone. Do not purchase if you are thinking of using this with an iPod or iPhone on iOS 5.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zyda

product_meta.title: TDK Life on Record 77000015360 3-Speaker Boombox Audio System
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingTDK Life on Record brings the original music culture icon back to life - combining dynamic sound performance, premium surfaces and features that let you customize the music your way. A dedicated, high excursion 6-inch subwoofer driver and two 6-inch coaxial drivers deliver full range sound with a bold, retro look. An innovative equalizer gives your music a visual heartbeat, while touch-sensitive buttons give you simple and intuitive control. Digital data streaming allows premium audio decoding and playback while charging Apple iPod and iPhone devices. Inputs include USB, 3.5mm and auxiliary ports that let you connect an iPod, iPhone, smartphone or USB flash drive. You can even plug in your guitar or microphone and mix with other music sources.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A reinvention of the original music culture icon, the TDK Life on Record 3 Speaker Boombox comes with high-tech touches for modern music lovers. One subwoofer and two speakers deliver vibrant, full-range sound, and the boombox is easily controlled with intuitive, touch-sensitive buttons and retro-style rotary dials. Hook up a variety of music players, or plug in your guitar or microphone to become part of the mix.



Dynamic Sound in a Classic Look
With a high-excursion, 6-inch subwoofer flanked by two powerful 6-inch coaxial drivers, the TDK 3 Speaker Boombox brings you a combined 35 watts of dynamic, full-range sound. The system's digital data streaming supplies premium audio decoding for optimal sound output. Additionally, a heavy-duty integrated tripod mount lets you position the boombox off the ground for maximum sound dispersion.The boombox's aesthetic recalls a classic 80s style with its retro rectangular shape, aluminum rotary dials, and a padded aluminum handle for protection and a premium feel.



Intuitive Controls Offer Ease of Use
The boombox incorporates modern, easy-to-use features. Touch-sensitive buttons offer simple and intuitive interaction, while the equalizer gives your music a visual heartbeat. Use the two rotary dials to regulate volume, toggle through radio stations, and adjust the customizable settings. The front-facing color screen adds a modern touch and makes it easy to navigate the controls.Play Music from Any Source
Multiple input options--USB, 3.5-millimeter, and auxiliary ports--let you connect a wide variety of music sources, including an iPod, iPhone, smartphone, USB flash drive, and external hard drive. You can also plug in a guitar or microphone to add yourself to the mix. Additionally, a built-in AM/FM radio with five presets lets you program your favorite stations.

For convenience, you can play your music while also charging your iPod or iPhone with the included USB to 30-pin cable.

Product and Warranty Information
Plug in this system with the included AC power supply, or use 12 D batteries (not included) for a portable option.

The TDK Life on Record 3 Speaker Boombox measures 15-1/2 by 23-3/5 by 5-3/10 inches (H x W x D), and weighs 26.3 pounds. It is backed by a one-year manufacturer's limited warranty.

What's in the Box
3 Speaker Boombox, AC power supply, USB to 30 pin Apple cable, and 3.5-millimeter audio cable.
feature_bullets: High-excursion dedicated 6-inch subwoofer provides deep,accurate bass
Two powerful 6-inch coaxial drivers deliver clear vocals and crisp highs
Play your iPod/iPhone music while charging using the USB to 30 pin Apple cable
Using the rotary dial and front facing screen, play and control music directly from storage devices including USB flash and external hard drives
Input options let you connect most audio devices and mix with an instrument

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars76 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
